snippet: The trustees of Loyola Marymount University in Los Angeles voted to drop elective abortions from health care plans offered to faculty and staff members in 2014.
abstract: Trustees of Loyola Marymount University, Jesuit institution in Los Angeles, vote to drop elective abortions from health care plans offered to faculty and staff members in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The trustees of Loyola Marymount University in Los Angeles voted to drop elective abortions from health care plans offered to faculty and staff members in 2014.

headline.main: Jesuit Campus to End Coverage for Elective Abortions
headline.print_headline: Jesuit Campus to End Coverage for Elective Abortions
